Job Title: Sr. Program Manager

Location: Richardson, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Mavenir is building the future of networks and pioneering advanced technology, focusing on the vision of a single, software-based automated network that runs on any cloud. As the industry's only end-to-end, cloud-native network software provider, Mavenir is transforming the way the world connects, accelerating software network transformation for 250+ Communications Service Providers in over 120 countries, which serve more than 50% of the world’s subscribers.

Role Summary

Coordinates departmental or cross-functional teams, focused on delivering new or upgrading existing products. Monitors the project from initiation through delivery including planning and directing schedules. Organizes cross-functional activities, ensuring completion of the project i.e. product on schedule and meeting quality standards.

Develops, defines and executes project plans, schedules, budgets and deliverables. Identifies needed resources for projects, defines and assigns major project roles.

Scrum Masters managing software development projects using the Agile development framework may be matched here.

Key Responsibilities

Build and Deliver New Project/Program SOW, Costing, Schedules, and RequirementsManage and Mitigate Intra/Inter Project/Program DependenciesProject/Program Planning, Execution, and On Time DeliveryCustomer Change Request / Up scope ManagementProject/Program Budget / Margin ManagementProject/Program Revenue ForecastingProject Actions, Issues, and Risks Management.Manage Project/Program Demand Planning with Supply Chain and R&DProactively drive Communications internally and Externally with CustomersManage and Maintain Account Operational and Program PrioritiesFocus on excellence in customer satisfaction

Job Requirements

Ideally, at least ten years or more of telecommunications experience and five years or more of customer facing experience. Prior experience with Mobile networks and project roll-outs is a must.At least five years of project management experience with navigation of major accounts. PMP certification or equivalent preferred.Technical Domain skills in Mobile, RAN, Radio Deployments and New Technology Introduction is required.Ability to Manage Complex multi-dimensional projects.Ability to handle multiple complex projects concurrently and ability to balance conflicting needs of the customer and internal requirements/requests.Anticipates and proactively addresses the customer’s needs.Persuasive and influential. Able to communicate effectively to disparate audiences, working level/technical to executive level.Financial and Business acumenSelf-starter who works without daily supervisionUnderstanding of Agile development methodologyProven track record of process improvementWell versed with tools and tactics for managing different aspects of project management.

Accessibility

Mavenir is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodation to individuals with physical and mental disabilities. If you are a US applicant in need of special assistance or an accommodation while seeking employment, please e-mail careers@mavenir.com or call: +1-469-916-4393. We will make a determination on your request for reasonable accommodation on a case-by-case basis.

Mavenir is an Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) employer and welcomes qualified applicants from around the world, regardless of their ethnicity, gender, religion, nationality, age, disability, or other legally protected status.

Experience Level (if available): None
